Submit an Application to change the Land Register APIs

Use this service to help lodge applications with HMLR to update the register or create a new lease or transfer of part.

Version and status

Overview

This new service will help to lodge applications with HMLR to update the register or create a new lease or transfer of part. It will be faster and more responsive than before and help identify errors prior to acceptance of an application. This will result in fewer requisitions and an improved experience for customers.

Using the new service API will mean that applications are only accepted onto the day list when the data provided is both valid and correct. Applications with validation errors will not be accepted. This will significantly reduce the number of avoidable administrative requisitions, identify common mistakes, such as name discrepancies or missing details, and increase our ability to automate applications.

How to integrate this service

To enable users to submit applications to HM Land Registry, you must build the following APIs.

Send a document API

The Send a document API allows users to create an upload URL and use it to upload their documents to the HMLR system.
  • Learn more about this API
  • Build this API using our technical guide
  • Test this API

Submit an application API

The Submit an application API allows an application (complete with documentation) to be submitted.
  • Learn more about this API
  • Build this API using our technical guide
  • Test this API

Notifications API

The Notifications API allows users to receive and acknowledge notifications about their applications throughout the submission process.
  • Learn more about this API
  • Build this API using our technical guide
  • Test this API

Application information API

The Application information API provides information about a specific application.
  • Learn more about this API
  • Build this API using our technical guide
  • Test this API

Attach a message API

The Attach a message API allows users attach text messages to an existing application. This includes replies to correspondence received from HM Land Registry about an application.
  • Learn more about this API
  • Build this API using our technical guide
  • Test this API

Attach a document API

The Attach a document API allows users to attach documents to an existing application. This includes attaching documents to replies sent to HMLR about an application.
  • Learn more about this API
  • Build this API using our technical guide
  • Test this API

Download a document API

The Download a document API provides a way to download documents created by HM Land Registry.
  • Learn more about this API
  • Build this API using our technical guide
  • Test this API

How the APIs work together

The diagram below shows how all the APIs should be used together to submit an application to change the land register from start to finish.
